code: @Override protected String getBlueprintDescriptor() {     // which blueprint XML file to use for this test     return "org/apache/camel/test/blueprint/configadmin-no-reload-loadfileoverride.xml". }

@Override protected String[] loadConfigAdminConfigurationFile() {     // which .cfg file to use, and the name of the persistence-id     return new String[] { "src/test/resources/etc/stuff.cfg", "stuff" }. }

@Override protected String useOverridePropertiesWithConfigAdmin(Dictionary props) throws Exception {     // override / add extra properties     props.put("destination", "mock:extra").     // return the persistence-id to use     return "stuff". }

@Test public void testConfigAdmin() throws Exception {     // mock:original comes from <cm:default-properties>/<cm:property name="destination" value="mock:original" />     getMockEndpoint("mock:original").setExpectedMessageCount(0).     // mock:result comes from loadConfigAdminConfigurationFile()     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedBodiesReceived("Bye World", "Yay Bye WorldYay Bye World").     // mock:extra comes from useOverridePropertiesWithConfigAdmin(), but BP container isn't reloaded     getMockEndpoint("mock:extra").setExpectedMessageCount(0).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
